channel.title: R Studio on PJR
channel.description: Recent content in R Studio on PJR

item.title: Blogdown + Hugo
item.description: I created this website using Academic in combination with the Blogdown package. If you would like to build a website using Academic, you can follow their step by step guide. Dan Quintana has a fantastic Twitter thread about how to install the Blogdown R-package, download the Academic theme, and customise your content.
